me.dotteam.dotprod.data

Class DBAssistant

  • java.lang.Object
    • SQLiteOpenHelper
      • me.dotteam.dotprod.data.DBAssistant

  • public class DBAssistant
extends SQLiteOpenHelper
    Class in charge of interacting with Android to use the OS-provided SQLite3 Database

      • onCreate

        public void onCreate(SQLiteDatabase sqlDB)

      • onUpgrade

        public void onUpgrade(SQLiteDatabase sqlDB,
             int prev,
             int curr)
        Method called when upgrading scheme version
        Parameters:
        sqlDB - Android's Database Handle
        prev - old version of database to replace
        curr - current schema version, defined by SCHEME_VERSION.
